title: Caretaker
name: Grayson
summary: The Caretaker is an unnerving figure, mumbling to himself as he drives the stagecoach down the old road, sells provisions for the monthly missions, and tends to the inhabitants of the Hamlet.
history: The Caretaker, once tasked with the upkeep of the estate, now wanders the town, driven mad by the horrors he has witnessed. His erratic behavior belies the knowledge and secrets he holds within.
other_notes: Prone to fits of maniacal laughter
